item.title: Freshman Kingston Flemings' Clutch Plays Lift Houston Over Texas Tech

item.title: Dusty May Reflects on Michigan's 1st Close Game of Big Ten Play
item.description: Michigan outlasted Penn State, 74-72, to remain undefeated, picking up lessons from its first close game in Big Ten play in the process.
